statements: SELECT * FROM EventAttendance WHERE event_name='Birthday Party';
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendee_name FROM EventAttendance WHERE attendance_status='Attending' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT event_name FROM EventAttendance WHERE attendee_name='John Doe';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(attendee_name) AS total_attendees FROM EventAttendance GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_attendees > 5;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name, attendee_email FROM EventAttendance WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND attendance_status='Attending';
SELECT * FROM EventAttendance WHERE attendance_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendee_name FROM EventAttendance WHERE attendee_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT event_name, attendance_status FROM EventAttendance WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT event_date FROM EventAttendance WHERE event_name LIKE '%party%';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(attendee_name) AS total_attendees FROM EventAttendance GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_attendees > 5 ORDER BY total_attendees DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_attendance;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_attendance WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_attendance ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM participants;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_attendance ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT event_name, participant_name FROM event_attendance JOIN participants ON event_attendance.participant_id = participants.participant_id;
SELECT event_id, event_name, participant_name FROM event_attendance LEFT JOIN participants ON event_attendance.participant_id = participants.participant_id;
SELECT participant_name, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM event_attendance JOIN participants ON event_attendance.participant_id = participants.participant_id GROUP BY participant_name;
SELECT * FROM event_attendance;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_attendance WHERE attendance_count > 50;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM event_participants WHERE event_id = 101;
SELECT event_type FROM event_types WHERE type_id = 3;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, attendance_count FROM event_attendance ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendance_count FROM event_attendance;
SELECT * FROM event_attendance WHERE attendance_count > 100;
SELECT event_name, attendance_count FROM event_attendance ORDER BY attendance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_participants INNER JOIN event_attendance ON event_participants.event_id = event_attendance.event_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_attendance WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM event_attendance;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_attendance ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, email, phone_number FROM attendee_details WHERE attendee_id = 2;
SELECT category_name, description FROM event_category WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, city, state, address FROM event_location ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendance_count FROM event_attendance ORDER BY event_date DESC, attendance_count ASC;
SELECT attendee_name, email, phone_number FROM attendee_details WHERE attendee_id = 3;
SELECT location_name, address, city, state FROM event_location WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT category_name, description FROM event_category WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY category_name;
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendance_count FROM event_attendance WHERE attendance_count > 50 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Event_Attendance;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event_Attendance ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM Event_Participants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT event_name, attendance_count FROM Event_Attendance WHERE attendance_count > 100 ORDER BY attendance_count ASC;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM Event_Venue WHERE venue_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Event_Attendance;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event_Attendance WHERE attendance_count > 100 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, event_name FROM Event_Participants INNER JOIN Event_Attendance ON Event_Participants.event_id = Event_Attendance.event_id;
SELECT event_name, venue_name, venue_location FROM Event_Attendance LEFT JOIN Event_Venue ON Event_Attendance.event_id = Event_Venue.venue_id;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM Event_Categories INNER JOIN Event_Attendance ON Event_Categories.category_id = Event_Attendance.event_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_events DESC;
